dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Compute 'intelligent' differences between two files / lists
dependencies.name: perl-algorithm-diff

dependent_to.description: Test strings and data structures and show differences if not ok
dependent_to.name: perl-test-differences

dependent_to.description: Test routines for examining the contents of files
dependent_to.name: perl-test-file-contents

description: Provides a basic set of services akin to the GNU diff utility.
name: perl-text-diff

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
